name: .CODASITE File Extension
summary: Learn about .CODASITE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Website project file created by Coda, a program used for creating and publishing webpages; stores the list of Web files for the project (i.e., .HTML, .CSS, .JS, and other supported types); also includes the publishing information for the remote server.

content: When you create a new site profile in Coda, a CODASITE file is saved to the ~/​Library/​Application Support/​Coda 2/​Sites/​ directory.
NOTE: Coda sites are managed through the Coda user interface and therefore CODASITE files are not manually opened by the user from the Mac Finder.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
